Enums/JumioZoomRetryReason.html#/c:@E@Ju.name: JumioZoomRetryReasonBadLighting
Enums/JumioZoomRetryReason.html#/c:@E@Ju.abstract: The user held the phone in a bad angle and should adjust it to eye level

Enums/JumioZoomRetryReason.html#/c:@E@Ju.name: JumioZoomRetryReasonFaceAngle
Enums/JumioZoomRetryReason.html#/c:@E@Ju.abstract: The lightning was bad, the user should avoid strong back lightning and darkness

Enums/JumioZoomRetryReason.html#/c:@E@Ju.name: JumioZoomRetryReasonBadLightingFailureToAcquire
Enums/JumioZoomRetryReason.html#/c:@E@Ju.abstract: The user tappped on the cancel button

Enums/JumioZoomRetryReason.html.name: JumioZoomRetryReason
Enums/JumioZoomRetryReason.html.abstract: The reason why a scan for a part has been unsuccessful

Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.name: titleImage
Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.abstract: UIImage object that is drawn instead of the title in the UINavigationBar.

Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html#/c:objc.name: borderColor
Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html#/c:objc.abstract: UIColor that is used to draw the border.

Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html#/c:objc.name: -setBackgroundColor:forState:
Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets the background color for specific states.

Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html#/c:objc.name: -backgroundColorForState:
Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html#/c:objc.abstract: Returns the background color for specific states.

Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html#/c:objc.name: borderColor
Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html#/c:objc.abstract: UIColor that is used to draw the border.

Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html#/c:objc.name: -setBackgroundColor:forState:
Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets the background color for specific states.

Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html#/c:objc.name: -backgroundColorForState:
Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html#/c:objc.abstract: Returns the background color for specific states.

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: colorOverlayStandard
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor that should be used for all standard scan overlays

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: colorOverlayValid
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor that should be used when highlighting a valid scan

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: colorOverlayInvalid
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor that should be used when highlighting a invalid scan

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: colorOverlayFill
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor that should be used as fill for the MRZ scan overlays

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: faceOvalColor
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor for the face oval outline

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: faceProgressColor
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor for the progress bars

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: faceFeedbackBackgroundColor
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor for the background of the feedback view

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: faceFeedbackTextColor
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor for the text of the feedback view

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: scanBackgroundColor
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor for the background of the scan view

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: disableBlur
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Disable blurred background by setting this property to true.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: enableDarkMode
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Sets the blur style to dark theme which is applied before all other customization options. Light blur is used as standard.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: foregroundColor
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Sets the color of the foreground. If nil the standard color will be used.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customLightFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the font name of your light font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customRegularFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your regular font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customMediumFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your medium font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customBoldFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your bold font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customItalicFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your regular italic font used within the application.

Protocols/JumioAppearance.html.name: JumioAppearance
Protocols/JumioAppearance.html.abstract: Protocol that is used for all UI Objects to be customized via UIAppearance

Classes/JumioBaseView.html.name: JumioBaseView
Classes/JumioBaseView.html.abstract: Base class which is used to set our SDK via UIAppearance pattern

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html.name: JumioScanOverlayView
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html.abstract: UIView that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used to tint our scan overlays.

Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html.name: JumioNegativeButton
Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html.abstract: UIButton that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used within our confirmation or error views and invokes a negative action (e.g. cancel, retry).

Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html.name: JumioPositiveButton
Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html.abstract: UIButton that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used within our confirmation or error views and invokes a positive action (e.g. readable, OK).

Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.name: JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView
Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.abstract: UIView that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used to define the uiimage that is - when set - drawn instead of the NavigationBar title.

Classes/JumioDeviceInfo.html.name: JumioDeviceInfo
Classes/JumioDeviceInfo.html.abstract: NSObject that holds information about the device.

Protocols/AuthenticationScanViewControll.name: -authenticationScanViewControllerDidStartBiometricAnalysis:
Protocols/AuthenticationScanViewControll.abstract: Show a activity/loading animation to the user until biometric analysis is finished (usually a few seconds).

Protocols/AuthenticationScanViewControll.name: -authenticationScanViewController:shouldDisplayHelpWithText:animationView:forReason:
Protocols/AuthenticationScanViewControll.abstract: Provide guidance by displaying a help text and animated view with the purpose to assist the user in a problematic situation.

Protocols/AuthenticationScanViewControll.name: -authenticationScanViewController:didDetermineRecoverableError:
Protocols/AuthenticationScanViewControll.abstract: Called whenever an error occured during the user workflow. Please find more information about this in our gihub implementation guide at https://github.com/Jumio/mobile-sdk-ios/blob/master/docs/integration_authentication.md#error.

Protocols/AuthenticationScanViewControll.name: -authenticationScanViewController:shouldRequireUserConsentWithURL:
Protocols/AuthenticationScanViewControll.abstract: This delegate is invoked when the end-user’s consent to Jumio’s privacy policy is legally required. Please call “userConsentGiven:” when the end-user has accepted.

Protocols/AuthenticationControllerDelega.name: -authenticationController:didFinishInitializingScanViewController:
Protocols/AuthenticationControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the SDK and all resources are loaded.

Protocols/AuthenticationControllerDelega.name: -authenticationController:didFinishWithAuthenticationResult:transactionReference:
Protocols/AuthenticationControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the SDK finished with success.

Protocols/AuthenticationControllerDelega.name: AuthenticationControllerDelegate
Protocols/AuthenticationControllerDelega.abstract: Protocol that has to be implemented when using AuthenticationController

Protocols/AuthenticationScanViewControll.name: AuthenticationScanViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/AuthenticationScanViewControll.abstract: Protocol that needs to be implemented when using Custom-UI functionality of Authentication

Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.name: apiToken
Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.abstract: The API token of your Jumio customer portal account

Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.name: authenticationTransactionReference
Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.abstract: Authentication transaction which has been created via the facemap server to server API

Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.name: userReference
Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.abstract: Set a reference to your user. Optional. (Maximum characters: 100)

Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.name: dataCenter
Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.abstract: Specifiy the DataCenter that should be used

Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.name: delegate
Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.abstract: Delegate which implements the AuthenticationControllerDelegate protocol for general interaction with the Authentication SDK

Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.name: authenticationScanViewControllerDelegate
Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.abstract: Delegate which implements the AuthenticationScanViewControllerDelegate protocol for using custom UI functionality of the Authentication SDK

Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.name: callbackUrl
Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.abstract: Callback URL (max. 255 characters) for the confirmation after the verification is completed.

Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.name: statusBarStyle
Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.abstract: Configure the status bar style for the duration the view controller for Authentication is presented

Classes/AuthenticationController.html#/c.name: -initWithConfiguration:
Classes/AuthenticationController.html#/c.abstract: Create an instance of the Authentication Mobile SDK.

Classes/AuthenticationController.html#/c.name: -destroy
Classes/AuthenticationController.html#/c.abstract: Call this method to destroy the AuthenticationController instance, before you set it to nil.

Classes/AuthenticationError.html#/c:objc.name: code
Classes/AuthenticationError.html#/c:objc.abstract: A 6-digit alpha-numeric code. The first letter (A-Z) represents the error case. The remaining characters are represented by numbers that contain information helping us understand the problem situation.

Classes/AuthenticationError.html#/c:objc.name: message
Classes/AuthenticationError.html#/c:objc.abstract: The human readable localized description. Localization can be adapted in our Localizable-Authentication.strings and it’s translations.

Classes/AuthenticationScanViewController.name: customOverlayLayer
Classes/AuthenticationScanViewController.abstract: UIView which should be used to add any additional custom views as a subview.

Classes/AuthenticationScanViewController.name: -retryScan
Classes/AuthenticationScanViewController.abstract: Call this method if you want to restart the scanning process after the delegate method authenticationScanViewController:shouldDisplayHelpWithText:animationView: was called.

Classes/AuthenticationScanViewController.name: -retryAfterError
Classes/AuthenticationScanViewController.abstract: Call this method in case an error was received in authenticationScanViewController: didDetermineRecoverableError: and user chose to retry.

Classes/AuthenticationScanViewController.name: -cancel
Classes/AuthenticationScanViewController.abstract: Call the cancel method anytime in the workflow to abort the AuthenticationController process.

Classes/AuthenticationScanViewController.name: -userConsentGiven:
Classes/AuthenticationScanViewController.abstract: Use this method when user consent is given.

Classes/AuthenticationError.html.name: AuthenticationError
Classes/AuthenticationError.html.abstract: Model class that describes an error situation with a code and a message. Please always include the whole code when filing an error related issue to our support team. Please find more information in our Mobile SDK Github Guides at https://github.com/Jumio/mobile-sdk-ios/blob/master/docs/integration_authentication.md#error .

Classes/AuthenticationController.html.name: AuthenticationController
Classes/AuthenticationController.html.abstract: Handles setup and control of the Authentication Mobile SDK.

Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.name: AuthenticationConfiguration
Classes/AuthenticationConfiguration.html.abstract: Authentication Settings class that is used to configure all available functional settings of AuthenticationController.
